Text: View Bidding on SothebyscomOn Wednesday night November Sothebys is pleased to present an exciting new feature that will allow you to track the bidding in our traditional salesroom auctions of Contemporary Art in real time on your computer screen The evening begins at pm EST with the sale of Contemporary Art from the Collection of Douglas S Cramer and continues immediately afterwards with Contemporary Art Part I To track the bidding in these sales click the following link and follow the instructions You can launch the viewer any time before or during the auctions by clicking View Bidding beneath the auction of your choice cgibinfloyeEQDBytOXBDUcAy You can also click see bids in real time on the Sothebyscom home page to access the viewer We hope you enjoy this window into Sothebys salesroom Your Email Address is in our mailing list To unsubscribe forward this message to newssothebyscom To update your profile visit cgibinprofileyeEQDBytOXz

View Bidding on SothebyscomOn Tuesday November at pm EST Sothebys invites you to track the bidding in our traditional salesroom auction of Latin American Art in real time on your computer screen To track the bidding in this sale click the following link and follow the instructions You can launch the viewer any time before or during the auction by clicking View Bidding beneath the auction of your choice cgibinfloyeFAODBytOXBDUcAA You can also click see bids in real time on the Sothebyscom home page to access the viewer We hope you enjoy this window into Sothebys salesroom Your Email Address is in our mailing list To unsubscribe forward this message to newssothebyscom To update your profile visit cgibinprofileyeFAODBytOXB
